summary: Configured Himalaya Neovim plugin for multi-email account support. Added Logos (Protonmail Bridge) folder mappings to folders.lua and password-auth detection to oauth.lua to skip OAuth validation for password-based accounts. Both Gmail and Logos accounts now work seamlessly with account switching, folder operations, and proper authentication handling.

artifacts.summary: Added Logos folder mappings to M.defaults

completion_data.completion_summary: Configured Himalaya Neovim plugin for multi-email account support with Logos (Protonmail Bridge) alongside Gmail. Added folder mappings and password-auth detection to prevent OAuth errors for password-based accounts.

next_steps: Test multi-account workflow in Neovim: :HimalayaAccountList, :HimalayaAccountSwitch logos
